PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 1993-15981993-07-210,  TC,  , 
PrecisOrder authorizing the Prince Rupert Port Corporation to enter into a SUPPLEMENTARY AGREEMENT with RIDLEY TERMINALS INC. that amends some of the terms of the Lease and the Supplemental Financial Agreement dated December 18, 1981, and in particular, eliminates references to site development surcharges, reduces the amount of annual guaranteed coal shipments through the terminal, and updates and amends the "force majeur" clause in the agreements so that it is the same as the one between Ridley and its shippers.
Attachments
